plugin.documentation: Use this plugin to build for the HTML5 platform.

configuration.elem: Use this to specifie the canvas size in the application html page. E.g.: <win-size width="1024" height="768" />.
Use this to add custom style to the application. E.g.: <style bgColor="#badda55" />.
Use this to add custom data to the application html header. E.g.: <header-section> <meta charset="UTF-8"> </header-section>. It supports multiple tags.

Use this to include external javascript code.E.g.: <js-source path="libs/mylib.js" applyTemplate="true|false" renamePackage="oldPackageName->newPackageName"/>. the applyTemplate and renamePackages attributes are optional.
Use this to add custom data before the head tag in the application html page. E.g.: <preheader-section> <doctype html> </preheader-section>. It supports multiple tags.

Use this to add custom data inside the body tag in the application html page. E.g.:

lorem ipsum

. It supports multiple tags.

arg.name: -debug
arg.documentation: Use this argument if you want to build in debug.

arg.name: -slimerjs
arg.documentation: Use this argument to make the app run on slimerjs which is a standalone tiny firefox. This has the benefit of not opening a new tab on your browser.

arg.name: -browser
arg.documentation: Use this argument to make the app run on browser. The default is slimerjs.
